trans-unit.source: Specifies details of an exception that has occurred and the details of the associated HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: 指定所发生异常的详细信息，以及关联 HTTP 响应的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the exception that will be processed and returned in the response.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将处理并在响应中返回的异常。

trans-unit.source: The exception that will be processed and returned in the response.
trans-unit.target: 将处理并在响应中返回的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the exception is a <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceException>, the message of the exception will always be returned to the client, regardless of the <xref:System.Data.Services.HandleExceptionArgs.UseVerboseErrors%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: 当异常为<xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceException>，该异常的消息将始终返回到客户端，而不考虑<xref:System.Data.Services.HandleExceptionArgs.UseVerboseErrors%2A>值。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.Services.HandleExceptionArgs.UseVerboseErrors%2A> is true, the inner exceptions will also be returned to the client; otherwise only the <xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceException> message will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Data.Services.HandleExceptionArgs.UseVerboseErrors%2A>为 true，内部异常也将返回到客户端; 否则为仅<xref:System.Data.Services.DataServiceException>将返回消息。

trans-unit.source: The string value that indicates the response format.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示响应格式的字符串值。

trans-unit.source: All errors result in an error payload sent back from the service.
trans-unit.target: 返回从服务发送的错误负载中的所有错误结果。

trans-unit.source: This property informs the service author of the format the error that will be sent back.
trans-unit.target: 此属性会通知将发送回的错误的格式的服务作者。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property will always be a valid Internet Assigned Numbers Authority (IANA) mime type.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值将始终是有效的 Internet 分配号机构 (IANA) mime 类型。

trans-unit.source: Gets the status code that will be sent back in the HTTP header section of the response when an error occurs on the data service.
trans-unit.target: 获取当数据服务上发生错误时将在响应的 HTTP 标头部分中发送回的状态代码。

trans-unit.source: An integer value of the HTTP response status code.
trans-unit.target: HTTP 响应状态代码的整数值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the response has been written.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已写入了响应。

trans-unit.source: Boolean value that indicates whether response has been written.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示是否已写入响应的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: If the value is true, the HTTP response headers and possibly part of the response body have already been sent to the client and cannot be altered.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 true，HTTP 响应标头以及响应正文的一部分已发送到客户端，不能修改。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether verbose errors will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指示是否将返回详细错误。

trans-unit.source: The Boolean value that indicates whether verbose errors will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示是否将返回详细错误的布尔值。

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Data.Services.HandleExceptionArgs.UseVerboseErrors%2A> is set to true, all exception details will be returned in the response.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Data.Services.HandleExceptionArgs.UseVerboseErrors%2A>设置为 true，将在响应中返回详细信息的所有异常。

trans-unit.source: Security Note: Setting this value to true may disclose information that should be private to the service.
trans-unit.target: 安全说明： 如果将此值设置为 true，则可能会透露应专用于该服务的信息。
